name: Body (BOD)
definition: Physical health, resiliency - affects damage taken

name: Reaction (REA)
definition: Reflexes, awareness, ability to respond to events.

name: Strength (STR)
definition: Indicator of damage and general strength.

name: Willpower (WIL)
definition: Desire to push through adveristy and weariness.

name: Logic (LOG)
definition: Calculating power of a rational mind, such as when repairing or solving puzzles.

name: Intuition (INT)
definition: Gut instict that tells you what to do before logic catches up.

name: Charisma (CHA)
definition: Personality and persuasiveness of your character - your charm, basically.

name: Essence (ESS)
definition: Your metahumanity - basically, how human you are physically and/or mentally (your soul)

name: Edge (EDG)
definition: Luck in the game - can push a check over the edge when you need it.

name: Magic (MAG)
definition: Ability to cast spells or use magic in any way

name: Resonance (RES)
definition: Similar to magic for mages, this is the Technomancers ability to interface with the Matrix with just their mind.
